items.value: Most of the Villagers in this world is <color=#FB6F37>Blessed</color>. There is only one <color=#FB6F37>Evil</color> character that you can afflict with the <color=#FB6F37>Psychopathy</color> trait. Protect and guide this Villager until it manages to eliminate <color=#FB6F37>5</color> other Villagers.
